summary: Demo login functionality testing completed successfully. All 5 demo login flows working perfectly with correct automatic redirections to appropriate dashboards. The handleDemoLogin function and redirectToDashboard logic implemented by the main agent are functioning as expected.
passed_tests: All demo login buttons are clickable and functional
Authentication system correctly identifies user types (visitor, admin, exhibitor, partner)
Each dashboard displays appropriate content for user type
Visitor Free shows 'FREE Pass' status correctly
Visitor VIP shows 'VIP Pass' status correctly
Admin dashboard loads with admin privileges
Login page loads correctly with all demo account options visible
Console logs confirm successful authentication for all user types
success_percentage: frontend: 100% (5/5 demo login flows working perfectly)
